name: Bucky Raw
description: '''Karwoudou Cole''' (born April 30, 1984), who is better known by his [[stage name]] '''Bucky Raw''', is a [[Liberia]]n rapper and songwriter from [[Monrovia]]. He rose to fame after appearing in a cypher at the 2016 [[Liberian Entertainment Awards]]. Raw has released the mixtapes ''Country Soda'' (2017) and ''Cs2'' (2018).
